item.title: new broken puzzle
item.description: 21:54 Tuesday 27 October 2015 JST From the toy store today I received a maze puzzle which had been broken by some careless use. They said they couldn’t sell it, so they gave it to me. yay! I think I can fix it, if I can just loosen one particular screw holding the broken piece on the puzzle. If I can loosen that screw, I can take it all apart, fix the broken bits and put it back together.

item.title: impossible puzzle?
item.description: 18:39 Tuesday 18 August 2015 JST At the toy store I found a take-apart puzzle featuring two loosely linked nails bent into trianglish G shapes. They are loosely linked, but they’re hard as nails, and I cannot seem to get them separated. Seriously, it looks like they’ve been mis-created (with automation, is that even possible??) or somehow “forced” into an unsolvable state. But they are so hard, I can’t seem to force them back.

item.title: Break a take-a-part puzzle
item.description: ##18:42 Tuesday 20 January 2015 JST## I went to the toy store today and they presented me with a puzzle they had been unable to take apart. It was like a “secret box” puzzle, but was not hollow inside. I set my timer for 30 minutes to make sure I left in time for Mutsumi’s lesson, then went to work. I was able to solve it in about 25 minutes.

item.title: puzzle still intact
item.description: previously ##17:10 Tuesday 9 December 2014 (written 01:44 Sunday 21 December 2014 JST) Wow the puzzle survived the week. My friend at the shop suggested it’s because it’s on a shelf too high for young kids to reach.

item.title: Toy shop near M and M lesson
item.description: ##18:40 Tuesday 25 November 2014 JST## I went to the toy shop near the Lotus dealership near Harajuku station. しばたさん recognized me, and I was all お待たせしました [sorry to keep you waiting] when I came in. They have a cool set of blocks to make marble tracks, including some big ones with near-baseball sized wooden balls that roll down the paths. I showed her a video of marble track 2, but certainly didn’t make her sit through the whole thing.
